Title: 30 Days of Night
Description: A small town in Alaska experiences a solid month of darkness every year. When the residents decide to stay behind, they are targeted by hungry vampires.

Title: Abraham Lincoln: Vampire Hunter
Description: After his mother is killed by a vampire, Abraham Lincoln dedicates his life to hunting them down.

Title: Blade
Description: A half-mortal, half-vampire warrior fights to rid the world of vampires.

Title: Blade II
Description: Blade must team up with vampires to defeat a new type of monster that threatens both races.

Title: Blade: Trinity
Description: Blade is framed for murders and must fight against humans and vampires.

Title: Blood: The Last Vampire
Description: A half-human, half-vampire swordfighter works for a secret government agency that destroys demons.

Title: Blood: The Last Vampire
Description: A seemingly ordinary teenager is a 400-year-old vampire slayer who hunts evil vampires.

Title: Bordello of Blood/ Demon Knight
Description: Two tales from the Crypt featuring a vampire and a man who guards a key that can unlock evil.

Title: Buffy the Vampire Slayer
Description: A teenager is trained to fight vampires.

Title: Byzantium
Description: Two female vampires on the run take refuge at a seaside British community.

Title: Captain Kronos - Vampire Hunter
Description: A supernatural expert and his assistant battle vampires in a village.

Title: Count Dracula
Description: Count Dracula gets younger whenever he drinks the blood of young maidens.

Title: Dark Shadows
Description: A rich and powerful playboy is turned into a vampire and buried alive. Two centuries later, he escapes.

Title: Daybreakers
Description: Ten years after a plague turns most of the world's population into vampires, a vampire hematologist searches for a cure.

Title: Dracula
Description: Count Dracula is condemned to live off the blood of the living for eternity. He travels to London to find a woman who looks like his dead wife.

Title: Dracula 2000
Description: Van Helsing relies on Dracula's blood to stay alive. When thieves steal Dracula's coffin, Van Helsing sets out to defeat him.

Title: Dracula Untold
Description: A just ruler makes a deal with a monster to protect his country from the Ottoman Empire but becomes a vampire.

Title: Dracula: Pages From A Virgin's Diary
Description: A ballet version of Bram Stoker's classic vampire tale.

Title: Freaks of Nature
Description: Vampires, humans and zombies fight against each other.

Title: Fright Night
Description: A teenager convinced his neighbor is a vampire turns to a washed-up television vampire killer for help.

Title: Fright Night
Description: A high school senior believes his new neighbor is a vampire.

Title: From Dusk Till Dawn
Description: On the run from a bank robbery, two criminals and their hostages end up in a topless bar that is home to vampires.

Title: A Girl Walks Home Alone At Night
Description: A skateboarding vampire preys on men who disrespect women.

Title: innocent Blood
Description: A vampire with a conscience only sucks the blood of criminals. She joins forces with an undercover cop to stop a takeover of the city by blood-sucking gangsters.

Title: Interview With The Vampire
Description: A suicidal vampire tells his story to an eager biographer.

Title: Jesus Christ Vampire Hunter
Description: Jesus Christ uses kung fu to wipe out a horde of bloodsuckers who attack lesbians.

Title: Kiss of the Damned
Description: A young screenwriter falls for a beautiful vampire but her cruel sister threatens to destroy their relationship
